    • Method Detail

      • listInspections

        public java.util.List<com.facility.use.Inspection> listInspections(com.facility.base.Facility fac)
        List the inspections at a particular facility. Uses sample dummy data in database.
        Parameters:
        fac - facility to search for inspections
        Returns:
        a list of inspections

      • isInUseDuringInterval

        public boolean isInUseDuringInterval(com.facility.use.FacilityUse facUse)
        Checks if a facility is in use during a particular interval by comparing the input parameter to the use table. Use room number 0 if checking entire facility. When checking if entire facility is in use, but only some rooms are in use, will return false.
        Parameters:
        facUse - instance of facUse to be checked which indicates the room number and start/end dates
        Returns:
        true if facility/room is in use, otherwise false

      • assignFacilityToUse

        public void assignFacilityToUse(com.facility.use.FacilityUse facUse)
        Assigns a facility to use by adding it to the use table. UseService has already confirmed validity of start and end date, existence of room number, and if room is already in use during this interval. Room number 0 indicates the entire facility is being assigned to use.
        Parameters:
        facUse - instance of FacilityUse to be assigned which indicates the room number and start/end dates

      • listActualUsage

        public java.util.List<com.facility.use.FacilityUse> listActualUsage(com.facility.base.Facility fac)
        Lists all the usage assignments at a particular facility from the use table. Usage assignments are first sorted by room number and then by date.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility to list the usage assignments for
        Returns:
        a list of FacilityUse objects containing a room number, start date, and end date

      • vacateFacility

        public void vacateFacility(com.facility.base.Facility fac,
                           int roomNumber)
        Vacates a facility/room by setting the end date of a current assignment to yesterday. This allows the facility to be reassigned starting today.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility to vacate
        roomNumber - room to vacate (0 if it's the entire facility)

      • getFacilityStartDate

        public java.time.LocalDate getFacilityStartDate(com.facility.base.Facility fac)
        Gets the creation date of a facility, which is the earliest start date assigned in the use table for that facility.
        Parameters:
        fac - Facility to get the start date
        Returns:
        start date for the facility
